title: The Five-Year Quarterback Outlook | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 271)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Kevin Clark dive into quarterback situations around the league over the next five years. They discuss the teams with problems on the horizon (19:00), and then Danny Kelly joins the show to decipher the five best quarterback outlooks around the league (38:00).

Hosted by: Robert Mays, Kevin Clark and Danny Kelly
Produced by: Jim Cunningham
Brought to you by: The Ringer Podcast Network




      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
